Title: 38861 - Ig Intro- Vaporcade- 38861
Direction: This assignment is for an introduction to an infographic. In the dropbox link provided you will find the IG. Yourdirections are to make  a 200-300 word unique intro for the IG. The Intro should be about the difference of cigarettes and e-cigs. The intro you are writing must naturally include the AT and URL provided.  Do not make subheads.
